item.title: Work experience
item.description: I have been with Microsoft since I started working. 2018 to 2021 (March) Supported enterprise customers to resolve their issues with O365 and Teams servers. 2021 (April) to 2022 (April) During this period I worked in the blue team of Microsoft where I used a lot of investigation tools to defend the corporate network against bad actors. 2022 (May) to present I am working in the hardware benchmarking space where we validate hardware use cases for deployment to production.

item.title: Research Interests
item.description: Distributed Computing I am largely interested in large vector and scalar clocks. Analysis of algorithms Currently I am working on Master’s theorem x86 architecture I am working on a small project where I am trying to get more hands-on with the x86 platform
